200146.「<pc>殿と お見受けしましたッ。\n 自分は ドルワーム軍の カアチスであり:
I see you are . I am Kaachis of the Dolworm Army. Thank you for your visit! We were originally
dispatched to escort the investigators of the Royal Dolworm Research Institute. However, things changed
drastically when the cocoon appeared. We have now established a frontline base on the Sand Dam to monitor the
movement of the cocoons, and we are working to gather information as quickly as possible.

entrusted with this archaeological survey. It is even more reassuring to know that he is a friend of yours.
Please use your elevator to get to Sand Dam!
